ygData.subject: Re: Where are the Minotaur Axes?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I m a sixth level Paladin running solo around Freeport.  Can anybody tell me where you get the Minotaur Axes I keep hearing about?  With my limited
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,
I'm a sixth level Paladin running solo around Freeport. Can anybody tell
me where you get the Minotaur Axes I keep hearing about? With my limited
funds, it seems like I'll be stuck with a rusty scimitar or sword for life!
Thanks!

PS Call this a Quest, it is for me!

Dave Nolle <dnolle@...>
aka Pendor - Defender of Light!
*******************************************************
David A. Nolle <DNolle@...>
aka Pendor: Defender of Light!!
*******************************************************
